text:
@DrRPNishank @HRDMinistry Sir, All of us are in a mentally gone depression that wheather the entrance and boards exams will happen or not??
In this Covid-19 pandemic, just postponed all entrance exams for while. First  all of these  situations get over. plz sir
#postponeneet
#postponejee
